amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to require the GAO to study how credit scores adversely impacted by a student borrowers defaulted or delinquent private education loan further impacts applying for future loans, including information on treatment of different demographic populations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to require the GAO to study how credit scores adversely impacted by a student borrowers defaulted or delinquent private education loan further impacts applying for future loans, including information on treatment of different demographic populations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shalala amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Shalala.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shalala amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
